143.title: Weyn, Suzanne. The Tiny Trapeze Artist
143.author: written by Suzanne Weyn ; illustrated by Cathy Pavia.
notes: Summary: Because of Meep the Mouse's bravery, he is able to rescue his adoptive monkey family from their captivity by the King of Bim.

144.heading: Wezel, Kapitan.
144.title: "The Rescue of Cora"
144.author: art: Joe Doolin
notes: Villains are Tiny, Mungo (introduced), Kapitan Wezel (introduced), and Nazis.
